relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, palpable peripheral pulses
relevant_findings.respiratory: Nonlabored breathing on room air; symmetric chest excursion
relevant_findings.gastrointestinal: Soft, nondistended; tenderness to palpation (TTP) in the epigastric area; no rebound tenderness; guarding present; no tap or shake tenderness
relevant_findings.extremities: Warm, well-perfused, no clubbing, cyanosis, or edema
